projects.title: Intro Section
projects.description: Intro section of a website with a navigation menu that sets the tone for the rest of the site. It includes a call to action, and a navigation menu to guide users to different sections of the site.

projects.title: Rest Countries
projects.description: This project offers a user-friendly and informative platform for exploring global data on countries, making it accessible to users with diverse interests and needs. Built with Reactjs

projects.title: Budget Buddy
projects.description: This is a mobile web application that helps you with your budget, you can manage multiple transactions and track your expenses. Built with Rails
